name: My Town: Pets
summary:
If you have a pet or are looking to adopt one soon, My Town : Pets is perfect practice! 
Start by adopting your favorite animal from the My Town Animal Shelter, then take them to the vet to get them checked out! Does your new pet need a bath? Give them a spa day by visiting the My Town Animal Spa, where you can also pick out some new clothes to keep them looking sassy at the animal park. 
 
My Town : Pets has everything you need to take care of your best friend. Take your dog to the dog park, but don’t forget to clean up his poop! Perhaps your cat would like a new collar, or your hamster needs a leash? You can customize their look at the spa. There are many hidden locations for you to invent a new story for your furry friends each time you play
